data.description:
Hyper Dash is a free VR multiplayer team based shooter. 

GAME MODES 
Payload, Domination, Control Point, (Team) Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Elimination, Ball and remix them with Mutators! 

MOVEMENT 
Dash, sprint, and rail grind your way across the arenas to engage the enemy in fast-paced combat and secure the objective for your team.

FEATURES 
Offline mode/Bots, Dedicated servers, Private servers, Rebind-able controls, Left hand support, Voice chat.

CROSS-BUY 
Buy for Rift or Quest and get the other free.

changelog.change_log:
**v1.25.10 hotfix**

**Fixed**
- settings: show chevrons setting and hide drones setting would affect each other
- payload: respawning broken if the game mode makes you switch teams while you were dead
- spectator: starting spectator in a certain way would make it display 2D in headset
- would never show "headset not found" if there were startup issues
- sparks sometimes not spawning.

**v1.25.10**

**Added**
- Option to hide dash chevrons
- Added username locking.  After rename you can't change it for 3 months. clan tags are unaffected

**Fixed**
- switching team while dead resets re-spawn timer
- Ball: fixed bounce shots not correctly working on goals
- Ball: fixed situation where bots didn't throw the ball

**Improved**
- Beginner servers: level has been raise to 20
- Dust park: small visual changes
- Waterway: spawn changes
- Updated Oculus XR
- Updated Steam XR

Update v1.24.4

New
- Game mode: Ball is back!
- New map: Dust Park.
- Alternate spectator control mode (drone controls).
- spectator hotkeys to toggle between fixed ( Ctrl + 1-9 )
- Added dedicated payload camera target (press g to activate)

Improved
- Replaced shock with smg in Abyss
- Increased minimum character height so player models look better when crouching low to the ground.
- When crouching too low (red circle) players can no longer use dashes.
- Modified spawn shield location in waterway and canyon.

Fixed
- Rockets can no longer be spawned inside walls.
- Collision on doors in Abyss
- Corrupted unlock list file no longer causes the game to crash on boot.
- spectator: players don't go invisible when spectator is in a wall.

Update v1.23.1

New
- Added place to enter gift codes for gifting credits.
- Banned users can now get a support code.
- Mutator for dash league payload matches.

Improved
- Payload Abyss: moved rocket pickup closer to the rail at the second red spawn
- Slow Motion mutator works better with pistol fire rate limit.
- SMG increased damage, reduced reloading time.
body shots 8 -> 6
Head shots 4 -> 3
Reload time 2s -> 1.5s
- Pico neo3 now mutes microphone when going in standby to save battery power.

Fixed
- Changing helmet and body at the same time in the customization menu only changed the helmet.
- Payload Abyss: fixed places where players could dash through walls.
- Deathmatch Crater: fixed places where players could dash inside pillars/walls.
- Data protection screen has wrong size when opening for the first time.
Issue where players could not start a custom server if the combined data of their name and equipment was too large.
- Issue where players could not login if they had a slow connection to Paris and needed to update localization files.
